attributes.description:
2014 Mercedes-Benz C220 Bluetec Exclusive 7 Speed Automatic with very low mileage in Iridium Silver with Black and Anthracite Leather.

Outside you have a beautiful car that has a Panoramic Sunroof, Adaptive LED Headlights, Park Distance Control Front and Rear. Exclusive 17? Multi-spoke Alloy rims finish the all round classic Mercedes look on the outside.

Inside you are greeted to a stunning combination of light Brown wood interior trimmings lining the interior leather. Your Infotainment system has navigation, Bluetooth with media streaming, auxiliary and USB connections.

Climate control further helps to keep you comfortable in this luxury interior. You get full on board trip computer, one touch window operation, as well as electronic boot open and close functions. Cruise Control with a speed limiter as well as collision avoidance and warning system.

This vehicle has full service history with only 62 000km’s on the clock.

attributes.description:
Suffering with the fuel price hikes, the this is the car for you, with incredible fuel consumption of 4.4 litres/100km .This extremely neat and well looked after Ford Ecosport is powered by a 1.5-litre TDCi power plant, which is retained from the outgoing version. It displaces 1498cc, and gives a remarkable mileage of 22.27kmpl. The plant gives a power of 98.59bhp at 3750rpm, coupled with a torque of 205Nm at 1750rpm to 3250rpm. The engine is paired with a 5 speed manual transmission, allowing efficient shifting and better performance.
Features include Central locking (Remote), Air conditioning/ Bluetooth connectivity/ 2 USB ports /Auxiliary input, Rear fog lights, High level brake light, On board trip computer, electronic mirrors, multi-function steering wheel controls, Park distance control rear, ABS, Brake assist, Stability control, VERY low fuel economy, 4 NEW TIRES. And many more desirable features! 


DONT MISS OUT ON THIS DEAL

TEST DRIVES WELCOME

We are based in CAPE TOWN (22 Section Street, Unit 1B, North Gate Park, Paarden Eiland) - Opposite North Gate Estate

We offer Finance through all major banks and trade ins are considered. 

Bloomsbury is known for supplying prestige and quality motor vehicles and motor cycles, we’d love to do the same for you TODAY!
E&OE

attributes.description:
The Jaguar XJ (XJ40) is a full-size luxury sedan manufactured by Jaguar Cars between 1986 and 1994. It was officially unveiled on 8 October 1986 as an all-new, second generation of the XJ to replace the Series III, although the two model ranges were sold concurrently until the Series III was discontinued in 1992. The XJ40 used the Jaguar independent rear suspension arrangement, and featured a number of technological enhancements (such as electronic instrument cluster).[2] The 1993 XJ6 earned the title of "Safest Car in Britain" as the result of a government survey.[3] The original 1986 car gave way to the heavily revised X300 model in 1994, followed by the X308 version in 1997. The XJ40 and its later derivatives, is to date, the second longest running Jaguar XJ platform with a total production run of 17 years.

The Daimler-branded (as seen by this vehicle) cars represented the highest trim level, and were sold as their Vanden Plas model by Jaguar dealers in the United States. Like the Sovereign, it was fitted with the single rectangular headlamps. Cosmetically, it differed from other models with its fluted radiator grille surround, boot-lid plinth and detail finishes. A Daimler interior features fold-out picnic tables for the rear passengers and a 2-passenger rear seat versus the 'flat', 3-passenger item on the Jaguars.

Feel free to contact us about this iconic car.
attributes.title: 1988 Jaguar XJ 6 3.6 Daimler
